oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of youths celebrating the end of WW II in the Pacific in Nashville, Tennessee, 1945 September 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a convertible car with teenagers waving American flags and holding a Banner newspaper high with the announcement "War Ends" in celebration of the end of WW II in the Pacific on 2 September 1945, known as VJ or VP Day. A formal parade in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, followed two days later. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Banner
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs
